About the Company: PB Films Ltd is a Film Production Company based in Kolkata and engaged in the business of production, co-production and distribution of Regional Language Films including Commercial Films and Art Films. The company commenced with a modest beginning and produced the first film in the year 2008 and ever since, the company has been on a steady growth curve in the field of motion picture production. During this journey, P.B. Films has produced an array Commercial and Art Films with an attempt not to leave any stone unturned in the Entertainment Industry.
